item.description:
Sometime it is important to see the mechanisms behind what is going on around us, sometimes we cant know those mechanisms. But sometimes we have a choice and as much argument as I've heard about whether reductive views are good or bad I've never heard anyone talk about when to chose one over the other.

So that's what Ill do during our next breakfast. I'll attempt to sketch out some of the pluses and minuses for taking a reductive or a robust view of ourselves, each other and the world around us.
item.name: Topical Breakfast: Unweaving and reweaving the rainbow
